text:
Ordered the tomato soup based with dory fish. Soup was on the sweeter side and I really like the noodles (mix between white and purple) which was so chewy. The fish was also very fresh.

The bowl was big and the portion was decent. Use FairPrice app for a 10% off.
The bowl with oyster mushroom is $7.80 here. Price is amazing with humongous Serving size which made even me full. Will confirm come back again if I very hungry! Soup is nice
LOVE this fish soup place - big portion (single serving can be comfortably shared between 2 people) and tasty!
I opted for dish number 44, which I believe was the sauerkraut fish spicy soup with rice. It was absolutely delicious and extremely appetizing.

Second time visit, $9.80 for this suan cai fish. Portion is huge. I’ve asked what does it include. They mentioned only fish. But when it came, it came with enoki mush room. I added extra veg.

Request not to have rice and change it to noodles, but they forgotten it. This I went back and they cooked it for me to be added.

Taste is salty and the 酸is there. Pretty shiok for a cold weather. Will definitely come back again.
